sentences.sContent: The floor was crawling with ants.
The traffic on the off-ramp slowed to a crawl.
sentences.sCn: 驶出匝道的交通慢得在爬进。

synos.tran: 爬行；[水产]养鱼池；匍匐而行

phrases.pCn: 慢行通过的空间；供电线或水管等通过的槽隙

remMethod.val: c + raw(生疏的) + l → 对地形生疏， 车开慢点 → 缓慢行进

trans.tranOther: to move along on your hands and knees with your body close to the ground
